response.overview: An ancient evil stalks and claims the souls of anyone who awakens its presence. Children playing with a Ouija board, as adults are confronted with the consequences of dabbling in the occult and must face the true essence of evil at Halloween. Set in the backwoods and swamps of Central Florida, Harlow's Haunt leads you through a maze of treachery and deceit spanning decades on this emotional and harrowing journey to the end - or is it?
response.tagline: Dear Brave Souls, You Have Entered Into Your Worst Nightmare
response.title: Harlow's Haunt

results.name: HARLOW'S HAUNT Starring John Dugan (The Texas Chainsaw Massacre) - BEHIND THE HAUNT  Featurette
